summary: The Greybeard robes can now be worn and when you wear all the pieces you can have unlimited shouts. The pieces include Greybeard Robes, Greybeard Hat, Greybeard Boots, Greybeard Ring and Greybeard Amulet. The set can be found in High Hrothgar. When you enter  keep going straight  and the will be on the right of the stairs. Hope you enjoy.
descriptionHtml: [size=4]The Greybeard robes can now be worn and when you wear all the pieces you can have unlimited shouts. The pieces include Greybeard Robes, Greybeard Hat, Greybeard Boots, Greybeard Ring and Greybeard Amulet. The set can be found in High Hrothgar. When you enter  keep going straight  and the will be on the right of the stairs. Hope you enjoy.[/size]
author: TheTrolledTroll
